verbose_text: We demonstrate that the critical role of the thioredoxin peroxidase activity of Tpx1 in the H 2 O 2 -dependent activation of Pap1 is to promote Txl1 oxidation and thus prevent Txl1 from reducing Pap1.
evidence: peroxidase activity of Tpx1 in the H 2 O 2 -dependent activation of Pap1 is to promote Txl1
